string.text: RECON BELOW GROUND
Enter the X-18 laboratory with the bandits
I must investigate the situation down in the underground labroratory with the bandit squad and inform Trukhlyay.
MISSING STALKER
Find the stalker dead or alive
Trukhlyay said that an experienced stalker went missing somewhere in X18. Perhaps I'll stumble onto him... or his body.
Investigate the area marked on the map

I found a map on the wealthy stalker's body with a highlighted area that likely has something to do with Freedom. I should check it out. The fact that it's located in bandit territory might be a problem, though...
Examine the laboratory with the bandits
I should check the laboratory together with the bandits.
Deal with the mutants
In order to advance further into the laboratory, the mutants need to be eliminated.
Talk to the bandit
Masol seems alarmed after the mutant attack. We should discuss how to proceed.
Examine all X-18 levels alone
I'm an idiot. I knew I shouldn't have trusted those bandit bastards! They'll pay for this one way or another.
I should've helped the bandits deal with the mutants, but oh well. They'll probably manage just fine while I go examine the laboratory. They probably wouldn't have came along anyway.
The mutants are dead. I'll go check what's happening on the lower levels. I don't think those crooks would've gone with me - they seem a bit too suspicious.
Eliminate the monster
Seems this is the same thing we killed on the surface. I hope to God I can handle it alone...
Return to the surface
The thing is dead. Time to go back up.
Now someone from Freedom is attacking me! Time to get the hell out of here already.
Check the unknown stalker's body
A stalker attacked me at the exit. Looks like he's from... Freedom? I should check his body for anything important.
Report to Trukhlyay
I finally got out. It's time to get back to Trukhlyay with the news, though not very good ones...
CODE-LOCKED DOOR
Find the door code
I need to find out what's behind the locked door. Perhaps I'll find the code after looking around a bit more.
Enter the next room
I have the code. Time to see just what is behind that door.
